channel.title: CVE Feed for Unitronics -- Vision1210
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unitronics -- Vision1210

item.title: CVE-2023-2003|2024-08-02T06:05:27.093Z -- unitronics -- vision1210
item.description: Embedded malicious code vulnerability in Vision1210, in the build 5 of operating system version 4.3, which could allow a remote attacker to store base64-encoded malicious code in the device's data tables via the PCOM protocol, which can then be retrieved by a client and executed on the device.
